bill.title: In abortion, further providing for definitions and for medical consultation and judgment, repealing provisions related to spousal notice, further providing for the offense of abortion of unborn child of 24 or more weeks gestational age, providing for dismemberment abortion ban and further providing for reporting.
bill.description: An Act amending Title 18 (Crimes and Offenses) of the Pennsylvania Consolidated Statutes, in abortion, further providing for definitions and for medical consultation and judgment, repealing provisions related to spousal notice, further providing for the offense of abortion of unborn child of 24 or more weeks gestational age, providing for dismemberment abortion ban and further providing for reporting.

votes.desc: House Health: Motion to postpone for purpose to hold public hearing.
House Health: Report Bill As Committed
House Health: Re-refer Bill To Another Committee
House Floor: HB 1948 PN 3056, MOT POSTPONE, DEAN
House Floor: HB 1948 PN 3056, MOT CONST, FRANKEL
House Appropriations: Re-report Bill As Committed
